Columns.Description: Name of the Computer/Node generating the log.
Columns.Name: Computer

Columns.Description: Container ID of the log source as seen by the Container engine.
Columns.Name: ContainerId

Columns.Description: Name of the Container generating the log.
Columns.Name: ContainerName

Columns.Description: Kubernetes Pod name for the Container generating the log.
Columns.Name: PodName

Columns.Description: Kubernetes Namespace for the container's pod.
Columns.Name: PodNamespace

Columns.Description: Log message from stdout or stderr. Being a dynmic field, json log messages can be queried without parse_json.
Columns.Name: LogMessage

Columns.Description: Source of the Log message. Possible vlaues are stdout or stderr.
Columns.Name: LogSource

Columns.Description: The timestamp (UTC) of when the log was generated.
Columns.Name: TimeGenerated

Columns.Description: A unique identifier for the resource that the record is associated with
Columns.Name: _ResourceId

Columns.Description: A unique identifier for the subscription that the record is associated with
Columns.Name: _SubscriptionId
